categories: Category:Songs by The Emperor's New Clothes

nodes.text: "Star Destroyer" was a song by the pro-Imperial musical group The Emperor's New Clothes, who performed in the minga genre of music. The song was featured on the compilation album Totally Patriotic, which was available by the period of time between 0 ABY and 4 ABY. Like all of The Emperor's New Clothes' work, "Star Destroyer" was approved by the Imperial Board of Culture.

"Star Destroyer" was one of the songs by The Emperor's New Clothes that were listed in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The guide was written by Simon Smith and Eric Trautmann.
